Task Content:
As a Ready Roofer special projects scheduler I would like to receive notifications via email & SMS when new special projects are created so that I can schedule a crew and add notes for that special project / job.

As scheduler, get notified on new job.
Who are schedulers? Admins ? Managers? 
Issue: jobs on calendar are currently all jobs, not specifically assigned jobs. 
Problem to solve: Efficiently finding updated jobs when doing sync.

Task Name: System emails scheduler automatically on new job creation.
Scheduler can assign crew and set job date/time.
Assigned crew receives notification by email + SMS.
System company scheduler email accounts / addresses are configurable by company admins
Scheduler may add contact notes on the job

Task Content: As office/sales staff I would like the ability to create warranty/special project jobs linked to existing Ready Roofer JobNimbus jobs so that I can create a Warranty &/or special job on a custom ReadyRoofer domain (such as specialprojects.readyroofer.com).

As crew member, I would like to receive job details via my preferred communication method (from email, SMS text, & in-app notifications) and have the ability to upload documentation, photos, and make notes on the project so that I can be aware of job criteria, address, timing, and share comments, workmanship evidence, receipts, and information on jobs.
As crew member I would like the ability to flag internal damage to the job site so that I can notify the team to process for additional jobsite-dependent work.

As office staff I would like to close out jobs by optionally, required, minimum 1, multi-selecting who to charge from "Warrantee", "Roofer", "Project Manager", and "Other" so that I can inform the office that the "job is complete" and "ready for billing / invoicing".

As office admin, customer, and/or jobsite crew member I would like to receive appropriate notifications when jobs are created, closed, and optionally when other activities occur (such as comments, equipment, & POs are added) so that I can take appropriate action and have a record of events as related to warrantee & special jobs and so that the company receives feedback on the job from the customer.

As a company admin, I would like to capture & be able to view reports on job data so that I can review & act on job information. 

Data we want:
Fuel & Miles
Brand & Shingle Color
Original Job date
Job date
cost of exepnse
crew assigned
pm assigned 
issue type
issue details
time / hrs
per diem 
motels / expenses
